data.title: It's All Gone, Pete Tong
data.text:
"Sensitive, expertly orchestrated, and as finely tuned as Beethovenâ€œ - The Times, London.

Part mockumentary, part comic biopic, IT'S ALL GONE, PETE TONG follows the rise to stardom of England's most notorious import to Ibiza, Frankie Wilde (Paul Kaye). But when this superstar DJ loses his hearing, he loses it all; his job, his wife, his friends and his life. After a self-destructive descent into madness and paranoia, Frankie not only finds true love but also returns to the scene, bigger, better and louder than ever before.

WINNER: 11 Awards including Best Canadian Feature Film at Toronto Film Festival

UK, Canada | English | 2004 | 90 min | HD
